product_description: Create a clear and professional look for your workspace with the Signs ByLITA Standard Conference Room Sign. Designed to be both practical and visually clean, this sign helps identify meeting spaces while blending seamlessly with modern office décor. Made from durable plastic, it is built for everyday use in busy environments such as offices, coworking spaces, and professional buildings. The sign includes strong two-sided adhesive foam tape (not attached), allowing for quick, no-tool installation on any flat surface. With three size options and a variety of colors available, it is easy to choose the right fit for your space and branding needs. The straightforward design and easy-to-read lettering make it an excellent choice for guiding visitors, organizing shared areas, and maintaining a polished appearance throughout your workplace. Simple, reliable, and versatile, this sign is a practical addition to any professional setting.

short_description: Sliding + Braille in One: Innovative design combines a sliding status indicator with Braille, meeting both regular and visually impaired users’ needs. ADA-compliant, perfect for conference rooms, offices, hospitals, and government facilities, where professionalism and accessibility matter.

Smooth & Durable Slide: Upgraded internal sliding track ensures a smooth, effortless switch between “In Use” and “Available.” Designed to withstand high-frequency use without loosening or jamming—solving the common issues seen in other office door signs.

Premium Brushed Silver Finish: Made of high-quality brushed aluminum, this do not disturb sign is scratch-resistant, fade-proof, and built to last. Its sleek, modern look complements conference rooms, front desks, and executive offices, enhancing your professional image.

No Drilling: Features industrial-grade strong adhesive backing—installs in minutes, stays securely in place, and removes cleanly without damaging doors. A better solution than other signs that fall off or leave sticky residue.

High-Visibility Design: Large, bold lettering with bright red and green color contrast makes it easy to identify status at a glance. Works perfectly as an in a meeting sign for office door or do not disturb sign, reducing interruptions and improving work efficiency.
